definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Defensibility is also taken into consideration when settling an area.
sentences.chinese: 定居地區還必須考慮到其防禦性。

sentences.english: China fought a defensive war with resoluteness and on its own initiative.
sentences.chinese: 中國參戰其性質屬於果斷與主動的防禦性參戰。

sentences.english: Callie and Thunder both have roughly the same degree of defense drive.
sentences.chinese: 佳麗和雷電大致擁有同樣程度的防禦性驅力。

sentences.english: The defensive necessity is to counter-attack the danger source.
sentences.chinese: 防禦性緊急避險是針對危險源本身所實施的避險。

sentences.english: Phenolic glycosides were main defense chemicals for Salicaceae.
sentences.chinese: 酚甙類物質是楊柳科植物體內最重要的防禦性物質。

definition: Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development of the PRC (MOHURD)/abbr. to 住建部[Zhu4 Jian4 bu4]
pinyin: Zhu4 fang2 he2 Cheng2 xiang1 Jian4 she4 bu4

definition: amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
to join an alliance/admission to the United Nations
